thread.title: Users complain Facebook is causing iPhone batteries to drain
thread.title_full: Users complain Facebook is causing iPhone batteries to drain - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Users complain Facebook is causing iPhone batteries to drain
text:
Facebook says it is working on a fix after issues over battery consumption, but denies that constant location tracking is the cause
Facebook’s iPhone app is consuming large amounts of battery charge even when it is not open, users have complained.
Users say the app records long periods of background activity, even when ... »
